headline: ‘AMERICANS HAVE HAD IT WITH ELITE MINDSET’: Watch Jim Jordan Go SCORCHED EARTH on Dems
sentences:
“They’re trying to make DC a state; trying to end the electoral college; trying to end the filibuster; trying to pack the Supreme Court; and they’re trying to get rid of Executive privilege.”
“[Americans] are so fed up with this elite mindset that says ‘we’re all dumb and they’re all smart’ Americans have had it with all this and I think you’re going to see it manifest itself in a big way come this November’s election.”
Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) stopped by Fox News’ The Ingraham Angle to absolutely destroy the Democratic narrative that Republicans and Donald Trump are a threat to Democracy.
